pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - HarborBreeze Hotel Resort HarborBreeze HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to HarborBreeze Hotel Resort's Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. Information Collected We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and preferences when you book a room or interact with our website. Use of Information The information we collect is used to provide you with our services, improve our website, and communicate with you about promotions and offers. Security of Information We implement security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access and disclosure. Changes to Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website.
